parameters: We will hunt \c[2]Hydra\c[0] if it is going to attack.
Don't tell me that you have sea sickness.
You can stay in the cabin until we arrive.
We are not going down easily!
We are not going down easily!
Arrr, ye scurvy jellyfish be the bane of me
beloved \c[1]Night Jewel\c[0]! I be none too pleased
with ye lot meddlin in me affairs!
Lets give 'em a taste of the briny deep!
Blast 'em to smithereens, every last one!
Even though those pirates are the enemy.
I can't let those monsters sink this ship!
Arr, this blunderin rapier be nothin but
bilge! 'Tis me bombs that wrought the havoc
and sent the scallywags to the deepr! Yarrr!
\c[2]Capt. Ivan\c[0] has combined the Water Orb with the \c[7]Sealed
\c[2]Capt. Ivan\c[0] has obtained \c[8]Unsealed Rapier of the Hydra.
The power of the \c[2]Hydra\c[0] in my hand !
Tis time to put it to the test, me hearties!
Shall we make 'em dance the hempen jig?
What sort of power was that !
Now you are one true pirate king!
We all witnessed the glory of pirate king
Har har har! Ye heard it straight from
The lot of ye be doomed! Yarrr!
Aye, lock em up tight in the brig!
Well be dealin with those barnacles once
